name: portrayal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the way that someone or something is described or represented in a painting, film, book, or other artistic work: His latest movie is a grim portrayal of wartime suffering. She won a Best Actress award for her portrayal of the title character in "Erin Brockovich". See
portray
More examplesFewer examplesSheen gave an uncanny portrayal of Tony Blair in "The Queen."The artist's works were known for their accurate portrayal of the Old West.They love the comic strip for its realistic portrayal of medieval times.
